mapper.select:
select aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, roadNameSeq, roadNameBasementCode, roadNameCode, dong, bonbun, bubun, sigunguCode, eubmyundongCode, dongCode, landCode, apartmentName, jibun, lng, lat from houseinfo
order by aptCode desc limit #{start}, #{listsize}

select house.aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, roadNameSeq, roadNameBasementCode, roadNameCode, dong, bonbun, bubun, sigunguCode, eubmyundongCode, dongCode, landCode, apartmentName, jibun, lng, lat from product as product left outer join houseinfo as house on product.aptCode = house.aptCode where userId = #{userId};

select house.aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, roadNameSeq, roadNameBasementCode, roadNameCode, dong, bonbun, bubun, sigunguCode, eubmyundongCode, dongCode, landCode, apartmentName, jibun, lng, lat, p.userId as ownerId, p.price from houseinfo as house left outer join product as p on house.aptCode = p.aptCode where house.aptCode = #{aptCode}
